comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Miserable in the sweltering heat. This photo was taken during a July, 1911 New York City heat wave that killed 146 residents and six hundred horses. Story in The New York Times, July 8, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9505E...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an article in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1911_Eastern_North_America_heat_wave
